parameters.name: ScaleApRoNumMax
parameters.description: The maximum number of stable AP read-only nodes. Valid values: 0 to 7.

parameters.name: ScaleApRoNumMin
parameters.description: The minimum number of stable AP read-only nodes. Valid values: 0 to 7.

parameters.name: ScaleMax
parameters.description: The maximum number of PCUs per node for scaling. Valid values: 1 to 8 PCUs.

parameters.name: ScaleMin
parameters.description: The minimum number of PolarDB capacity units (PCUs) per node for scaling. Valid values: 1 to 8 PCUs.

parameters.name: ScaleRoNumMax
parameters.description: The maximum number of read-only nodes for scaling. Valid values: 0 to 7.

parameters.name: ScaleRoNumMin
parameters.description: The minimum number of read-only nodes for scaling. Valid values: 0 to 7.
